snippet.title: Loong - Fantasy MMORPG - Power of the Dragon Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Loong now for free! : http://goo.gl/OMglmH

Loong is the most anticipated Chinese free-to-play MMORPG ever created, with hundreds of thousands of Asian players already enjoying the stunning, next-generation graphics. Join the epic thousand-strong siege battles, create a truly unique character via the nine skill trees and take on any profession you desire. The gameplay experience evolves with time, you unlock unique skills as you play with friends or family. Loong brings a wealth of novel ideas to the European free-to-play market - something for casual players and hardcore gamers alike.

Feel the power of the dragon and register for free:
http://goo.gl/OMglmH
